text: 10.30: Lo 32.35-36; Sng 50.4; 135.14; Ro 12.19Nza kaŋgi, Fhe Bakɨme khaŋ suaŋgi, “Tɨvi mbatɨgi ŋgarkargane, ne na bigɨn ma! Gu nduara mbe muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi ŋgarkav, gu muumbara mbatɨgar mben muuŋgirga.” Ana ne suaŋgiap wom khaŋ suaŋgi, “Guma Bakɨme, ana nduara wo gumgi gu mbigi ga suaŋv suaŋgirga.”
